column5: and pulled pork.  For a place called "Smoque"
column6: I am kind of surprised at the lack of smoke flavor in the meats.  While very tender
column7: I find the brisket to be lacking in that smoky flavor that I am used to getting.  Something tells me it is because they do not have enough time to dedicate to the smoking
column8: while accommodating the thousands of people they get each day.  Same can be said for the pulled pork and hot link.  Where this place has truly disappointed me though
column9: is in their ribs.  I have yet to have a batch that wasn't dried out and chewy.  The sauce they serve with the meals is very good
column11: ask for the spicy version as well.  Very good in its own right.
